faction_profile.name: 남만야수궁 (Southern Beast Palace / 南蠻野獸宮)

location.geography: Deep jungles of Yunnan/Vietnam border. Hot, humid, filled with poisonous creatures.

heritage.philosophy: Survival of the fittest (Nature). Harmony with beasts.
heritage.structure: Tribal / Monarchy. Ruled by the Beast King (Ya-wang).

status.tier: Major Outer Faction (King of the South).
status.political_role: Neutral/Isolationist but fearsome in war due to beast armies.

combat_style.summary: Primitive brute strength combined with animal companions.
combat_style.visuals: Tiger skins, bone weapons, fighting alongside tigers/elephants.

signature_ultimate.name: 백수신공 (Hundred Beast Divine Art)
signature_ultimate.description: Mimicking the movements and power of a hundred beasts.

role: Providers of 'exotic' challenges (fighting monsters instead of humans).
A potential ally for the protagonist if they gain the Beast King's respect.
Source of chaos (e.g., a beast stampede).
